gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.data

Class DataArray.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.data.DataArray.Builder
  • Enclosing interface:
    DataArray

    public static class DataArray.Builder
extends Object
    A DataArray builder. Use one of the following to create a new builder:
    • DataArray.builderWithData(double...)
    • DataArray.builderWithData(Iterable)
    • DataArray.builderWithSize(int)
